class.name: ELFScript
class.brief_description: A container for binary ELF files that can be attached to and executed inside Sandbox nodes.

method.name: get_content
method.description: Returns the binary content of the program. This is the ELF binary data that can be executed by Godot Sandbox.

method.name: get_sandbox_for
method.description: Find a shared Sandbox instance associated with the given Object.

method.name: get_sandbox_objects
method.description: Returns an Array of all Objects associated with the Sandbox instances that use this ELF script.
